channel.title: yumyum on Barefoot Rob

item.title: yoga day with Paola and Jon
item.description: ##22:52 Saturday 23 March 2013 posted 10:51pm Saturday 23 March 2013 8:43pm Saturday 23 March 2013 Lin and I are on the train from Paola and Jon’s house; we were the only two students in yoga class, so we got all the attention and all the goodies after the lesson. Yummy chicken stew something, several types of cheese + sembe, and a fruit pie with three or four types of fruit jam filling.
